name: Easy Roasted Oyster Mushrooms
author: Soup Loving Nicole
summary: This is a 4-ingredient foolproof recipe for roasted oyster mushrooms. Oyster mushrooms have a slightly chewy texture and are mild in flavor, making them the perfect side dish for any meal.
directions: Cut off any tough ends of the mushroom stems and discard
Place mushrooms in a large bowl
Add olive oil, salt, and pepper
Let mushrooms sit to absorb the oil while the oven preheats
Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil
Spread mushrooms out on the prepared baking sheet in one layer
Roast in the preheated oven for 12 minutes
Using tongs, flip mushrooms over and continue roasting to desired doneness, about 10 minutes more
